name: Spinner
author: Potch
description: A loading spinner with optional status text

getters.duration: Time it takes spinner to complete rotation
getters.label: Text to display within the spinner
getters.reverse: If present, spinner will rotate counterclockwise instead of clockwise
getters.src: URL of image to use in place of CSS spinner

setters.duration: Time it takes spinner to complete rotation
setters.label: Text to display within the spinner
setters.reverse: If present, spinner will rotate counterclockwise instead of clockwise
setters.src: URL of image to use in place of CSS spinner
